Unlock your winning potential with 1xBet, where exceptional betting meets extraordinary rewards! Join millions of passionate sports bettors worldwide who trust our secure, licensed platform to deliver an unmatched betting experience.

Begin your journey with a variety of exciting bonuses and seasonal promotions designed to maximize your opportunities and keep the excitement going all year round. From generous welcome bonuses to unique seasonal offers, 1xBet continually delivers thrilling incentives to boost your bets and enhance your overall experience.

As a globally recognized brand, 1xBet is honored to sponsor leading sports clubs and renowned events including FC PSG, FC Barcelona, Serie A, and the prestigious CAF Africa Cup of Nations. These partnerships underscore our commitment to excellence, ensuring you have direct access to the elite action and thrilling opportunities.

Our advanced sportsbook platform delivers exceptional functionality, providing you with extensive betting options, highly competitive odds, and real-time live scores. Feel the thrill of live sports action by streaming your favorite football matches, captivating UFC bouts, and exciting MMA events seamlessly through our integrated match streaming service.

Stay ahead of the competition with in-depth sports statistics and up-to-the-minute football results. From Premier League excitement and Bundesliga intensity to the prestige of the Champions League and the thrill of the NBA, NHL, UFC, and esports competitions, 1xBet arms you with precise information and expert insights.

Don't wait for another moment—download the 1xBet app today, sign up quickly, and join an exclusive global community of sports betting winners. Step into the action with 1xBet and transform every bet into a winning opportunity!

Yalla Hagz – Book Football, Padbol and Padel Courts Instantly

Yalla Hagz is the easiest and most reliable way to book football, padbol and padel courts across Egypt. Whether you're a group of friends, a team, or a player joining open sessions, Yalla Hagz helps you find, book, and manage your games in seconds.

Discover and Book Courts

Explore a wide selection of football and padel courts near you.

View detailed court information including size, surface, amenities, and user ratings.

Check real-time availability and secure your preferred time slot instantly.

Smooth and Reliable Booking Experience

Browse available dates and times with a simple, intuitive interface.

Receive immediate booking confirmations with no phone calls required.

Get reminders and notifications to stay organized and ready for your next match.

Friendly Matches and Community Play

Join friendly matches hosted by players across any court.

Create your own match and invite others to join.

See player profiles, positions, skills, and social links to connect with the community.

Manage All Your Games in One Place

Access a personalized dashboard with all your upcoming and past bookings.

Edit or cancel your bookings when needed.

Stay updated with automatic notifications and reminders.

Community Ratings and Insights

Read reviews and ratings to choose the best courts.

Share your own feedback to help improve the playing experience for others.

Designed for Convenience

Filter courts by location, price, amenities, and availability.

Enjoy a clean, fast interface designed for quick and seamless booking.

Be the 1st to Know! 365Scores helps you become an EXPERT OF THE GAME with Live Scores, Pre-Game Stats and Predictions, In-Depth Data, News Updates, Upcoming Fixtures, Lineups - and everything else you need to stay connected to your favorite players, teams, and competitions.

Join over 150 million sports fans who rely on 365Scores for real-time updates, pre-game stats and in-depth insights.

* EXTENSIVE SPORTS COVERAGE
Follow the UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, LaLiga, NBA, Wimbledon, and 2000+ competitions in 10 different types of sports, including top football, basketball, tennis events and much more – all in one live scores app.

* LIVE FOOTBALL RESULTS
Get all the latest football news and updates, right at your fingertips! Football scores from your favorite football teams, such as Real Madrid, Manchester City, Liverpool and much more!

* EXCLUSIVE iOS FEATURES
365Scores offers two powerful iOS widgets to keep you closer to the game than ever:
Home Screen Widget – Instantly view your personalized My Scores list with live and upcoming games — right on your home screen. Perfect for quick updates and easy access to the matches you care about.
Live Activities – View real-time scores directly on your home screen, even when your phone is locked.

* TEAM NEWS & STATS
No matter which team you support, 365Scores delivers everything you need: live scores, sports news, squad updates, real-time stats, league tables, transfer updates, and social media buzz.

* PRE-GAME STATS & PREDICTIONS
Get a competitive edge with our comprehensive pre-game stats, including head-to-head records, recent form, key player analysis, and expert insights. These data-driven predictions help you to prepare for each game. Stay ahead of the game with 365Scores!

* CUSTOM SPORTS SCOREBOARD
Choose your favorite teams and leagues to follow, or pick matches instantly.
Get real-time football updates whenever you need them.

* INSTANT MATCH NOTIFICATIONS
Stay updated with instant match alerts! Follow every play with our Live Match Tracker, even when you can’t watch live
Warning! Our live match notifications may be faster than your match stream!

* LIVE SPORTS CALENDAR
Check our ALL SCORES tab, the most updated multi-sport calendar that you can find.
365Scores delivers full coverage of 9 sports: Football, Basketball, Tennis, American Football, Baseball, Handball, Ice Hockey, Rugby and Volleyball - with more than 2,000 competitions, including: UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, Spanish LaLiga, German Bundesliga, Italian Serie A, AFC Champions League, NBA, NFL, NHL, MLB, Wimbledon and much more!

Be an expert of the game with 365Scores – download now and never miss a moment!

We’re always happy for any feedback!

NOVA Soccer Hub App - delivers a complete Soccer tracking experience for fans worldwide. Whether you want to follow live scores, analyze matches, check team lineups, or explore player profiles, this app has it all—wrapped in a clean and intuitive interface.

NOVA Soccer Hub App Key Features:

* Live Match Center - Follow real-time updates with live scores, match time, key events, and team lineups.

* Detailed Statistics - View comprehensive stats including shots, passes, fouls, offsides, possession, and more—visually compared between both sides.

* Fixture & Schedule View - Plan ahead or look back with a calendar-based view of upcoming and past matches sorted by day.

* Predictions & Analytics - Check team performance, form streaks, head-to-head comparisons, and match outcome predictions based on data.

* Point Tables & Standings - Track team positions and points across various leagues and tournaments.

* Team Overview & Profiles - Get venue details, overall performance records, and recent match outcomes. Explore squad rosters categorized by position.

* Player Profiles - Dive into individual player stats, bio details (age, height, nationality, position), recent matches, and league-wise performance breakdown.

* Explore by Country - Search and filter content based on your favorite countries or regions, allowing for a personalized football-following experience.

* Favorites Tab - Save your favorite matches, teams, players, and leagues to quickly access them anytime from one central tab.

Whether you're a casual viewer or a dedicated football analyst, NOVA Soccer Hub App is dedicated to stay informed, entertained, and engaged—no matter the league, team, or competition. Download Nova Soccer Hub app now.

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Welcome aboard your football journey, the first free-to-play football prediction game in the region that turns every match into a chance to win. Predict wisely, climb the leagues, and unlock exclusive rewards.
Detailed Highlights
1-The Hottest Football Prediction Game
Ingame brings you handpicked matches from around the world, including Saudi and Egyptian leagues. Predict outcomes, use Jokers strategically, and unlock real rewards as you climb the divisions.
Every login feels like a kickoff — minus the warm-up laps.
2- Predict and Win Gems
Think you know football? Prove it! Predict matches outcomes from local rivalries to world finals, rack up points, and rise through the ranks. Win Pro Events and earn shiny Gems — your ticket to bigger prizes and bragging rights. With Ingame, the match is only half the fun.
3-Climb the Divisions
Prove you’re more than just a football fan. Start as a ROOKIE, level up and climb your way to be The Phenomenon or maybe even The GOAT. Every correct prediction moves you closer to the top, unlocking prizes and prestige along the way
Rise to the challenge and cement your place among the elite football strategists.
4-Unlock Achievements
Show off your skills with unique badges and achievements. Become The Sniper, a Clean Cheater, or El Dynamo. Track your progress, share your wins with friends, and let the world know where you stand.
 In Ingame, every milestone becomes part of your football legacy.
5- Play Hard. Build your private collection.
Ingame isn’t just about predicting the match — it’s about showing off your style. Unlock unique football jerseys, rare badges, and exclusive rewards that put extra swagger in your game. From legendary kits to brag-worthy achievements, every prediction adds style to your journey.
 Because in Ingame, winning feels good— but winning with style feels better.
6-Redeem for Real Gift Cards
Your passion pays off. Collect Gems and redeem them for real-life rewards. The more you play Pro, the more you earn. 
Play the game, enjoy the matches, and turn your passion into real rewards.

À l'occasion des événements sportifs au Maroc, un écosystème numérique innovant a été développé pour offrir aux supporters, visiteurs, volontaires et organisateurs une expérience 100% digitalisée. L'application YALLA est le compagnon de l'ensemble des grands événements sportifs organisés ou coorganisé par la Fédération Royale Marocaine du Football au Maroc.
YALLA offre la possibilité de :
- Créer et gérer le FAN ID, indispensable pour accéder aux stades et Fan Zones
- Déposer une demande d'e-Visa en ligne si nécessaire.
- Accéder aux actualités, programmes et informations pratiques liées aux événements sportifs.
- Consulter les services liés à l'organisation : transport, hébergement et activités.
- Rester informé en temps réel des mises à jour officielles.
YALLA centralise tous les services numériques afin que chaque participant profite pleinement des compétitions sportives au Maroc.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly

Korta – Find Your Perfect Padel Partner
Tired of waiting around for the right player to show up? Korta is the padel matchmaking app that gets you on court with compatible partners in seconds. No more mismatched skill levels, no more awkward games. Just smart matching, real connections, and the community you've been looking for.

Why Korta is Truly Unique:
Intelligent Matchmaking Algorithm – Korta learns your play style, skill level, and preferences. Our advanced algorithm matches you with players at your level or slightly above, ensuring competitive and enjoyable games every time.
Built-In Chat – Connect with potential partners before you meet. Chat, build relationships, and find your regular playing crew. Great matches become great friendships.
Speed Meets Quality – Find a match in seconds, not days. Our matching engine prioritizes both speed and compatibility, so you're never waiting long and never playing mismatched games.
Community First – Build your padel network. Connect with players, track rivalries, and grow the padel community together. Every match strengthens your connections.
Fair Rating System – Trust matters. Korta's transparent ELO-based rating system reflects true skill and reliability, so you know exactly who you're playing with.

Key Features:
Instant Matching – Get paired with compatible players in seconds
Smart Skill Matching – Our algorithm ensures balanced, competitive games
In-App Chat – Message partners, coordinate timing, build friendships
Player Profiles – Complete profiles with skill level, play style, and ratings
Real-Time Notifications – Never miss a match opportunity
Local Court Integration – Find players near your favorite courts
Transparent Ratings – See how players are rated by the community
Multi-Skill Support – From beginners to pros, Korta matches everyone
Quick Game Setup – Confirm matches and get playing fast

Perfect For:
Casual Players – Find friendly partners for weekend games
Competitive Athletes – Challenge yourself with well-matched opponents
New to Padel – Connect with experienced players who'll help you grow
Building a Crew – Find your regular playing partners and community
Serious Competitors – Track your progress and climb the rankings
Anyone Who Wants Better Matches – Tired of unbalanced games? Korta fixes that

How It Works:
Create Your Profile – Set your skill level, preferred playing style, and local courts
Get Matched – Our algorithm finds compatible players instantly
Chat & Confirm – Connect with your match through in-app messaging
Play – Show up, play an amazing game, rate each other
Build Community – Track your partners, build rivalries, grow your network
Download Korta today—it's completely free. Find your perfect padel match.
